mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pay (pay_num, ord_num, price, mtd_code, card_appv_num, card_cncl_num, pay_date, state, remark, reg_date, reg_id, up_date, up_id) VALUES (#{pay_num}, #{ord_num}, #{price}, #{mtd_code}, #{card_appv_num}, #{card_cncl_num}, #{pay_date}, #{state}, #{remark}, now(), #{reg_id}, now(), #{up_id})
mapper.update: UPDATE pay SET card_appv_num = #{card_appv_num}, card_cncl_num = #{card_cncl_num}, pay_date = #{pay_date}, state = #{state}, remark = #{remark}, up_date = now(), up_id = #{up_id} WHERE pay_num = #{pay_num}
